events.message: The claimant reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at a busy intersection last evening.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming it involved a car collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to this case to assist the claimant with all requirements and communications.
The claimant was sent a formal acknowledgment of the claim to assure them their case is being processed promptly.
The claimant was requested to submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the repair estimate.
The claimant submitted the required police report, detailed photos, and an official repair estimate for evaluation.
An investigation commenced to verify the circumstances of the accident and to assess the extent of vehicle damage.
The investigation has concluded after reviewing all evidence, confirming fault and damage assessment.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover all repair costs and associated expenses arising from the auto accident.
The customer provided positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the speed and clarity of the claim process.
The claim was formally approved, confirming that the insured will receive payment as per policy terms.
The payment covering vehicle repairs was issued promptly to the claimantâ€™s account to facilitate quick resolution.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming that the repair process has been completed satisfactorily.
The entire claim file has been archived as per policy to maintain records for future reference if necessary.
